mapper.insert: insert into board(board_title, board_content, board_thumbnail, course_id, board_register_time) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{thumbnail}, #{courseId}, now())
mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.board_title, u.user_name, b.board_register_time, b.hit, b.board_thumbnail from user u, user_course uc, board b where b.course_id = uc.course_id and uc.user_id = u.user_id and b.board_title like concat('%', #{word}, '%') order by b.board_register_time desc limit #{start}, #{number}

select b.board_id, b.board_title, u.user_name, b.board_register_time, b.hit, b.board_thumbnail from user u, user_course uc, board b where b.course_id = uc.course_id and uc.user_id = u.user_id and u.user_id = #{userId} and b.board_title like concat('%', #{word}, '%') order by b.board_register_time desc limit #{start}, #{number}
select count(*) from board where board_title like concat('%', #{word}, '%')

select b.board_id, b.board_title, b.board_content, u.user_name, u.user_login_id, b.board_register_time, b.hit, b.board_thumbnail from user u, user_course uc, board b where b.course_id = uc.course_id and uc.user_id = u.user_id and b.board_id = #{boardId}
